channel.title: How to make npc dialogue teleport [Delta]
channel.description:
How can I make it so a Npc gives player a choice to teleport or not.
Than-You.

item.title: How to make npc dialogue teleport [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

add a a new case with your other dialogue like this:

case #:
choice("yes", "no"),
break;

Then in clickingMost.java there are 2 cases ull need, one for the top choice (case 9157:) and one for the 2nd choice. (case 9158:)
add in the case

if(c.NpcDialogue == #) {
     c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
     c.triggerTele(x, y, height?);  //your teleport
}

and in the 2nd choice case I guess you want the the dialogue to just close, so just do

if(c.NpcDialogue == #) {
     c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
     c.closeAll();
}

Google it the next time, there is more than enough stuff around around dialogues ectâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npc dialogue teleport [Delta]
